title: Manage Scale Squeeze Job
description: A production engineer plans and executes a 'scale squeeze' job, injecting scale inhibitor into a formation to prevent mineral scale from blocking a production well.

tasks.description: Analyze the well's production water chemistry to select the most effective scale inhibitor chemical.
tasks.expected_outcome: The optimal chemical for the specific water composition is selected.

tasks.description: Design the squeeze treatment, including the volume of chemical to be injected and the required shut-in time.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed treatment plan is designed.

tasks.description: Monitor the job execution and, after bringing the well back online, monitor the produced water to ensure the inhibitor concentration is at the target level.
tasks.expected_outcome: The job is completed, and post-job monitoring confirms its success.
